Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Drink coffee. Review agenda.
Finalize the compliance manual. Send the final draft to Legal Counsel and the CIO for approval.

Send out a company-wide email (via @MKT_1 for distribution) announcing the upcoming compliance training program. Include the date, time, and location of the training. @PEOPLE: MKT_1. Topic: Compliance Training Announcement
Practice the compliance training presentation, making sure to speak clearly and concisely. Rehearse the quiz.

Conduct a pilot compliance training session with a small group of employees to get feedback and make any necessary adjustments. Include @QRES_1, @DSDE_1, and @SDEV_1.
Address any remaining compliance issues identified by Legal Counsel. Draft responses to any legal concerns.
Review the progress of the automated compliance monitoring system with DevOps Engineer. @PEOPLE: DEV_OPS. Topic: Update on automated compliance monitoring
Plan the task list for tomorrow.
End of day. Leave the office.
